lines: ji ltar yan lag tshogs tsam la
brten nas shing rtar 'dogs pa ltar
de bzhin phung po rnams brten nas
kun rdzob sems can zhes bya'o
mthun rkyen sgrub par byed pa'i lus can rnams
rgyal ba byams pa mgon po'i zhabs drung du
theg mchog chos kyi dpal la spyod par shog
nam zhig rdo rje'i gdan gyi ri bo'i spor
byams mgon nyin byed dbang po shar pa'i tshe
bdag gi blo gros padmo kha bye nas
skal bzang bung ba'i tshogs rnams tshi mas byed shog
de tshe rgyal ba byams pa rab tu dgyes
phyag g.yas bdag gi mgo la bzhag bzhin du
bla med byang chub mchog tu lung bstan nas
byang chub sgrub pa'i tshe rabs kun tu yang
dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas thams cad kyi
rlabs chen spyod pa ji snyed mchis pa kun
gcig tu bsdus nas tshul bzhin 'doms par shog
legs bshad ri mo bkra ba'i lung gi gos
rnam dpyod gser gyi yu ba la brten cing
bslab gsum nor bu'i tog gis rab mtshan pa'i
bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan phyogs bcur 'dzugs par shog
phan bde'i 'byung gnas bstan pa dar zhing rgyas
bstan 'dzin skyes bu thams cad sku khams bzang
lus can kun la bde skyid 'byung ba'i gnas
bkra shis lhun po rtag tu rgyas gyur cig
rtag tu byams pa rnam gsum goms pa'i mthus
bdud sde byams pa'i dpung gis 'joms pa dang
'gro kun byams pa'i stobs kyis skyong mjad pa'i
